title: Identification
fullText:
â€¢ On the adoption of a Part 1 solution in relation to an electrical installation, the main switchboard of the installation where the Part 1 solution has been adopted, and any other switchboard that is associated with the Part 1 solution, shall be clearly and permanently marked with the intent of the following words:

Example of the wording: WARNING: PART OR PARTS OF THIS INSTALLATION ADOPT A PART 1 SOLUTION UNDER AS/NZS 3000 AS SHOWN IN THE DOCUMENTATION.
